delete[SELECT Id FROM account where Data_ExternalId__c like 'Sreejith%'];

        accountRecords.add('Westend Dealers,Boston,MA,SF100112,Service');
        accountRecords.add('Westinghouse Corporation,Louisville,KY,SF100113,Manufacturing');
        accountRecords.add('Wind & Rain,Irvine,CA,SF100114,Others');
        accountRecords.add('Wyse Corp.,Austin,TX,SF100115,Technology');
        accountRecords.add('Xerox,West Caldwell,NJ,SF100116,Others');
        accountRecords.add('Yesterday Productions Corp.,Jackson,MI,SF100117,Manufacturing');
        accountRecords.add('Ziff-Davis Labs,Olathe,KS,SF100118,Manufacturing');
        accountRecords.add('Zoo Gift Shop,Downers Grove,IL,SF100119,Manufacturing');
        integer i = 0;
		//Loop through the List of accountRecords, create a reacord for each item in the list.
        for(String accountRecord : accountRecords) 
        {
            List<String> values = accountRecord.split(',(?=([^\"]*\"[^\"]*\")*[^\"]*$)', 0); 
            Account sampleAccount = new Account( Name           = values[0],
                                                 BillingCity    = values[1],
                                                 BillingState   = values[2],
                                                 AccountNumber  = values[3],
                                                 Data_ExternalId__c = 'Sreejith'+i,
                                                 Industry       = (values[4].startsWith('"') && values[4].endsWith('"')) ? values[4].substring(1, values[4].length()-1):values[4],
                                                 Site		    = 'SampleData');
            accounts.put(values[0], sampleAccount);		
            i++;
        }
        upsert accounts.values();  


        delete[SELECT Id, JBCXM__Account__r.Data_ExternalId__c FROM JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c where JBCXM__Account__r.Data_ExternalId__c like 'Sreejith%'];
        Map<String, JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c> customerInfoData = new Map<String, JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c>();
        List<String> CustomerInfoRecords = new List<String>();

        CustomerInfoRecords.add('AAR Corp Hardware Abscoa Division,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Abacus Programming Corporation,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Abberley Kooiman,ActiveCustomer,stage3');

        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Raceway Engines,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Raleigh Active Wear,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Raleigh Co.,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Ralston Inc.,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Sabena-Belgian World Airlines,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Safeway Plumbing & Heating Inc,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Saint Johns University Staten,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Star Markets,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('State House Active Wear,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Tapecon Inc,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('TDA Industries Inc,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('TEAC Corp. of America,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Tech Fire & Safety Company,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Teradyne,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('UBAF Arab American Bank,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('UniAmerica Inc,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Union Flights,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('United Artists Theater Circuit,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('United Can Co.,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Veritas Software,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Via Systems,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Vicor,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Volga Boats,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Vyrex,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Wallys World,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Westend Dealers,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Westinghouse Corporation,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Wind & Rain,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Wyse Corp.,ActiveCustomer,stage3');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Xerox,ActiveCustomer,stage4');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Yesterday Productions Corp.,ActiveCustomer,stage1');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Ziff-Davis Labs,ActiveCustomer,stage2');
        CustomerInfoRecords.add('Zoo Gift Shop,ActiveCustomer,stage3');

        Account accountValue = new Account();
        Map<String, JBCXM__PickList__c> stageValues = new Map<String, JBCXM__PickList__c>();
        Map<String, JBCXM__PickList__c> statusValues = new Map<String, JBCXM__PickList__c>();
        for(JBCXM__PickList__c statusd : [SELECT Id, JBCXM__SystemName__c FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer Status'])
        {
            statusValues.put(statusd.JBCXM__SystemName__c, statusd);
        }

        for(JBCXM__PickList__c staged : [SELECT Id, JBCXM__SystemName__c FROM JBCXM__PickList__c WHERE JBCXM__Category__c = 'Customer Stage'])
        {
            stageValues.put(staged.JBCXM__SystemName__c, staged);
        }


        for(String CustomerInfoRecord : CustomerInfoRecords)
        {
            List<String> values = CustomerInfoRecord.split(',', 0);
            accountValue = accounts.get(values[0]);
            JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c customerInfo = new JBCXM__CustomerInfo__c( JBCXM__Account__c = accountValue.Id,
                                                                JBCXM__Status__c  = statusValues.get(values[1]).Id,
                                                                JBCXM__Stage__c   = stageValues.get(values[2]).Id,
                                                                JBCXM__ASV__c = 0,
                                                                JBCXM__MRR__c = 0,
                                                                JBCXM__NextRenewalDate__c = null,
                                                                JBCXM__OneTimeRevenue__c = 0,
                                                                JBCXM__OriginalContractDate__c = null,
                                                                JBCXM__OriginalContractNumber__c = '',
                                                                JBCXM__Users__c = 0,
                                                                JBCXM__Comments__c = '');
            customerInfoData.put(values[0], customerInfo);

        }
        Upsert customerInfoData.values();
